attributes.action: stop invergordon port authorities allowing cruise ships to dock in invergordon
attributes.additional_details: Stop invergordon port authorities from bringing more Corona virus cases to our beautiful country
attributes.background: Help stop invergordon port authorities to cancel all cruise ships from docking until the Corona virus pandemic has ended

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
